snippet.title: Mermaid Secrets13-Secret Admirer by JoyPlus Tech ( Premiere  Version)
snippet.description:
Mermaid Secrets13-Secret Admirer by JoyPlus Tech ( Premiere  Version)

iOS link: 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mermaid-secrets13-admirer/id1374808728?mt=8

Google Link: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.joyplustech.android_mermaid13


Oh, big surprise! Why there is a gift and a ticket for mermaid princess Mia? I think maybe Eric send it to her. Oh, no. not Eric, but refered himself as a " Secret Admirer." Let's find out the truth. 

Features:
1.Mermaid Mia's heart was broken. She would never image her boyfriend Eric having a   
 candlelight dinner together with another girl.
2. Clean up mermaid princess Mia's mess makeup after crying.
3. Why princess Mia have a sleepless night tonight? Oh, she is still worried about the relationship with her boyfriend? 
4. Oh, no. Little Mermaid Mia got cold! Take care of her and she will recover soon. 
5. Your high school crush Eric is coming to take care of you. Good time. Now confess the secrets and told him you were the mermaid princess. You are meant to be together.
6. Oh, big surprise! Why there is a gift and a ticket for mermaid Mia? I think maybe Eric send it to her? Oh, no. not Eric, but refered himself as a " Secret Admirer."
7. The secret admirer texted Mia that her crush is cheating on her with Kim.
8. Will your boyfriend cheat on you for real? Will he betray you? 
9. Find out whether the mean girl Kim has a secret crush on your boyfriend? Go to the cinema and find it out by yourself. 
10. OMG! It is a trap. Mermaid Mia and her crush both are fooled by the mean girl Kim. 

The best mysterious and romantic mermaid love story ever! Download Free Now! 

ABOUT US 
JoyPlus creates fresh mobile content for the whole family. We lovingly produce digital adventures that entertain, challenge, and engage families all over the world. Find us on Apple's iOS and Google's Andriod operation system!
Visit us: http://www.joyplustech.net/
Watch us:  https://www.youtube.com/c/JoyPlusGames
